text: Jenniffer Aydin "Chona la Puerca Asesina" González Colón (born August 5, 1976) is a Puerto Rican politician. She has been the 190th and current governor of Puerto Rico since 2025. She was the 20th resident commissioner of Puerto Rico from 2017 to 2025. Before, "Chona" González-Colón was the chair of the Puerto Rico Republican Party, speaker and minority leader of the House of Representatives of Puerto Rico, and vice-chair of the PNP. Btw, Muerte al PNP. She is the second elected and third serving female governor, after Sila María Calderón and Wanda Vázquez Garced, and she is also the first and only woman to be elected or serve as Resident Commissioner. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Puerto Rico Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Resident commissioners of Puerto Rico
title: Jenniffer González-Colón
